New Records: Donovan Mitchell scored a season-high 37 points.
Cleveland Cavaliers extended their undefeated streak to 14 games, a franchise record.
Key Match Events: Donovan Mitchell scored 37 points and made 7 of 13 three-point shots.
Darius Garland contributed 29 points and nine assists.
Jarrett Allen recorded a double-double with 24 points and 10 rebounds.
Caris LeVert scored 22 points off the bench.
Cleveland Cavaliers finished with a decisive 21-7 run to seal the victory.
